thread.title: Gwyneth Paltrow shares rare picture of daughter Apple: see here
thread.title_full: Gwyneth Paltrow shares rare picture of daughter Apple: see here

title: Gwyneth Paltrow shares rare picture of daughter Apple: see here
text:
Gwyneth Paltrow shares rare picture of daughter Apple: see here February 28, 2017 by Sharnaz Shahid Gwyneth Paltrow shares daughter Apple and son Moses with ex-husband Chris Martin, the pair 'consciously uncoupled' in 2014 Leave a comment 
Gwyneth Paltrow is one proud mother. The 44-year-old took to her Instagram page on Monday to share a candid picture of her daughter Apple ahead of a dance competition. The snapshot sees the 12-year-old dressed in an embroidered red dance costume, while her long tresses are swept into a tight bun. Gwyneth simply captioned the photograph with the hashtags, #countdowndancecompetition and #dancemum. 
Gwyneth shares Apple and her ten-year-old brother Moses with ex-husband, musician Chris Martin ; the pair "consciously uncoupled" in 2014 after ten years of marriage. Despite their divorce, the former couple have remained on good terms and work hard to ensure their children are their top priority. Last year, Gwyneth opened up about the end of her marriage with Chris, admitting she was proud of their relationship as co-parents. A post shared by Gwyneth Paltrow (@gwynethpaltrow) on Feb 26, 2017 at 4:29pm PST 
Take a peek inside Gwyneth Paltrow's perfectly-organised pantry 
"As anybody who has been divorced knows, you have to put a lot aside to maintain the family and the practicalities of what that might mean and sometimes thatâ€™s quite tough on a personal level," the Hollywood star told Page Six , adding, "It's a commitment I make every day to my children and their father even though we're not in a romantic relationship." 
GALLERY: The most surprising celebrity splits 
Speaking of his divorce, Chris previously told The Sunday Times : "It's always out there in the media, but I have a very wonderful separation-divorce. It's a divorce but it's a weird one. It's funny. I don't think about that word very often- divorce. I don't see it that way. I see it more like you meet someone, you have some time together and things just move through." Gwyneth has since been in a relationship with Glee co-creator Brad Fulchuk since August 2014, while Chris is believed to be dating Peaky Binders actress Annabelle Wallis .
